externalflashconnection: Hotshoe (P-TTL, high speed sync available), wireless with PENTAX dedicated flash, X-sync socket
imagestabilization: Mirror dampening hardware applies a braking action to the mirror swing
weatherproofing: Fully weather sealed and coldproof design
remotecontrol: Yes, infrared (0s, 3s, continuous) and cable switch
systemsoftwarerequirements: Windows: Windows XP/Vista/7, USB 2.0 port Mac: MacOS-X 10.3-10.5, USB 2.0 port
whitebalance: Auto preset modes: Auto, Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Fluorescent (D, N, W, L), Tungsten, Flash, CTE Manual mode(s): Yes, manual and 3 color temperature selections available>br>  WB fine adjustment available in all modes
connectivity: USB2.0 (Hi-Speed: mini B-type), Video output (mini phone type), HDMI output (type C mini), DC input , Cable switch, X-sync socket
burstcapability: Up to 1.1 frames per second at full 40MP resolution
exposuremodes: Program (P), Sensitivity Priority (Sv), Shutter Priority (Tv), Aperture Priority (Av), Shutter and Aperture Priority (TAv), Metered Manual, Bulb, X-Speed
viewfindertype: All-glass, trapezoid pentaprism viewfinder with interchangeable focusing screens
